alert.note: Alert for Lunenburg; Mecklenburg (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 07 at 8:16PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Mecklenburg and southwestern Lunenburg Counties through 900 PM EDT... At 815 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Kells Corner, or near Chase City, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Heavy rain could result in ponding of water on roadways in low lying and poor drainage areas. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Chase City around 830 PM EDT. Boydton around 900 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Wilburn, Beechwood, Loves Mill, John H Kerr Dam, North View, Finneywood, Fairview, Plantersville, Rogers Corner and Blevins Corner. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
